channel.title: Where do you hide your porn?
channel.description: Where do you hide your porn? I keep mine in a hidden folder called " " without the ""s on my F drive. My mags are buried under all my cloths in my drawers :D.

item.title: Where do you hide your porn?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I don’t download it as I share a computer. I usually just go to the site and delete the website history and temporary files that download.

item.title: Where do you hide your porn?
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:112, topic:133831”][quote author=the bank link=topic=185104.msg2616923#msg2616923 date=1231097930]

Funnily enough, It’s actually hidden in one of my SCAR folders.
Somewhere in Scripts, then test, then a hidden folder, then all organized through video’s and pictures.

Oh god you collect gay porn?

hahaha omg

I dont download mine, i just view them on the web.
[/quote]Then you are downloading it…

streaming isnt techincically classed as downloading. Yes it does go to your temp folder but not even for a substantial time. Mostly till you close the video. Hence why pressing back and then re-clicking the link starts the streaming process again[/quote]It is still being downloaded to your computer, and is using up your bandwidth, so yes, it’s downloading.

Read full topic

item.title: Where do you hide your porn?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282

Oh god you collect gay porn?

hahaha omg

I dont download mine, i just view them on the web.
[/quote]Then you are downloading it…[/quote]
streaming isnt techincically classed as downloading. Yes it does go to your temp folder but not even for a substantial time. Mostly till you close the video. Hence why pressing back and then re-clicking the link starts the streaming process again

item.title: Where do you hide your porn?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“adamp40, post:100, topic:133831”]OK OK… I will now get the real ultimate way but it will take a very long time to write:

First you Put your PC on a Deserted Island and put it inside a metal bulletproof house that has no doors or windows. You then put the computer in the basement and get your Internet Via a cable that goes ~1000miles away and then use a proxy. You then Add a FingerPint Scanner, a Saliva DNA Test and a Face/Voice Recognition Device. When your on your Computer, Partition your HD into 20 Parts and Install a OS in a secret anguage that you made up yourself. After that put a password on the main account thats called “fisdbuiofrbsadiofbtosdibfosb” and the password “heioahaeroiababros” then you download Virutal PC put its contents in a System Folder on a Random Partition (M:&^*"^&£^"(()\POOOOOR\n\S\E\x\978-2-4-3453-5342) so its Hidden and then Install the Same Secret Language OS onto a Virual Machine which you store on the Y:\ Parition of the Drive. Renovate The Virtual Hard Disk to a .gfsdhafuisdbifa format and Store it in Y:\das\i5\Goot%\Buuutsm\P\o\R\N. When your on your Virtual Machine you make yet another Virtual Machine like the Step above but use a Differnt User and Password and Locations and Then Keep your Porn Folder in a .rar Format In S:\7^%*z\35£%£&&\zYH. Then Renovate it to a *.fehauofbgsdaiose88838&&*7 Format.

If that Doesnt keep your naughty folder private i dont know what does![/quote]
Or C:\WINDOWS\system32\pr0n

Read full topic

item.title: Where do you hide your porn?
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

OK OK… I will now get the real ultimate way but it will take a very long time to write:

First you Put your PC on a Deserted Island and put it inside a metal bulletproof house that has no doors or windows. You then put the computer in the basement and get your Internet Via a cable that goes ~1000miles away and then use a proxy. You then Add a FingerPint Scanner, a Saliva DNA Test and a Face/Voice Recognition Device. When your on your Computer, Partition your HD into 20 Parts and Install a OS in a secret anguage that you made up yourself. After that put a password on the main account thats called “fisdbuiofrbsadiofbtosdibfosb” and the password “heioahaeroiababros” then you download Virutal PC put its contents in a System Folder on a Random Partition (M:&^*"^&£^"(()\POOOOOR\n\S\E\x\978-2-4-3453-5342) so its Hidden and then Install the Same Secret Language OS onto a Virual Machine which you store on the Y:\ Parition of the Drive. Renovate The Virtual Hard Disk to a .gfsdhafuisdbifa format and Store it in Y:\das\i5\Goot%\Buuutsm\P\o\R\N. When your on your Virtual Machine you make yet another Virtual Machine like the Step above but use a Differnt User and Password and Locations and Then Keep your Porn Folder in a .rar Format In S:\7^%*z\35£%£&&\zYH. Then Renovate it to a *.fehauofbgsdaiose88838&&*7 Format.

If that Doesnt keep your naughty folder private i dont know what does!
